襸字的基本解释

襸
zàn
美好；妍丽。
鲜艳的衣服。

襸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zàn］
［《廣韻》則旰切，去翰，精。］
(1)美妍。
(2)鲜艳美丽的衣服。
[②]［cuán］
［《集韻》徂丸切，平桓，從。］
补。

襸字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　襸； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1127第27
【唐韻】【集韻】?則旰切，音贊。衣好貌。【類篇】鮮衣謂之襸。【玉篇】襸，好也，姸也。　亦作㜺。

襸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
襸字的起名意思

美好；妍丽。鲜艳的衣服。

Stubborn
zàn
Beautiful; Yanli.
Bright clothes.
Stubborn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zàn］
["Guangyun" is cut, go to Han, fine. ]
(1) Miyeon.
(2) Bright and beautiful clothes.
[②] [cuán]
["Ji Yun" Chu Wan cut, Ping Huan, from. ]
Make up.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　襸; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1127 27
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? It's cut, and the sound is praise. Good-looking clothes. 【Classes】Xianyi is called the "Xianyi". [Jade articles] You, good too, too.　亦作㜺.
